maxPageButtons.description: number of page buttons to be showed

showFirstPage.description: if first page button should be showed when this page is out of range of pages limited by maxPageButtons prop

showLastPage.description: if last page button should be showed when this page is out of range of pages limited by maxPageButtons prop

previousPageText.description: text to be displayed in previous page button

nextPageText.description: text to be displayed in next page button

PreviousPageIcon.description: icon to be displayed in previous page button

NextPageIcon.description: text to be displayed in next page button
